heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers in the northern mountains, southern Greens, and Berkshires; another trace to 2 inches. Lows in the single digits to lower teens, some mid teens far south. West winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph, except gusting to 40 mph in the southern Greens and Berkshires.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of late-day snow showers west of the Greens. Highs from the upper teens to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 in the south. Light winds, becoming southwest 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night, New Year’s Eve
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of snow showers in the St. Lawrence Valley, otherwise periods snow, with 1 to 3 inches, upper to 5 inches in the northern mountains and southern Greens; snow could be briefly heavy. Lows from zero to 10 above north, and 5 to 15 in the south. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, becoming northwest late.
